name: analysis
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool seo_fast_audit.
Tool description: One click onpage SEO audit API : Analyse the content from an URL the major SEO tags : title, description, H1, img, and links. insanely fast < 200ms
API description: Analyzes the content from a given URL using the SEO Fast Audit API.

url.description: The URL of the website to be analyzed.
